snippet: Chipper Jones was a great choice by the Braves in 1990. Matt Bush, the Padres' pick in 2004, has languished in the minors.
abstract: Chipper Jones was a great choice by the Braves in 1990. Matt Bush, the Padres' pick in 2004, has languished in the minors.

headline.main: The Standouts and the Washouts Among No. 1 Draft Picks
